name: Retrobloc CPC
description:
Retrobloc CPC is a 3d puzzle game, similar to the late 80's Block Out, for the Amstrad CPC 464 / 664 / 6182. The game is simple to play but hard to master!

Three different blocksets are available to challenge your skill.

Game controls are:

WASD : Move block

Space: Drop block

U, I, O, J, K, L: Rotate block
